BCA ATM
1. Insert your ATM card and input your PIN.
2. Choose Another Menu.
3. Choose Virtual Account Billing.
4. Input the Virtual Account number above.
5. Input the amount of Rupiah you want to deposit.
6. Follow further instruction.
BCA Mobile Banking
1. Login to your BCA Mobile Banking account.
2. Choose Transfer.
3. Choose Virtual Account Billing.
4. Input the Virtual Account number above.
5. Input the amount of Rupiah you want to deposit.
6. Follow further instruction.
ATM Bersama
1. Insert your ATM card and input your PIN.
2. Choose Another Transaction Menu.
3. Choose Transfer to Another Bank.
4. Input BCA bank code followed by the Virtual Account number above.
5. Input the amount of Rupiah you want to deposit.
6. Follow further instruction.
Transfer from Other Bank
1. Choose Transfer to other bank menu or Transfer online to other bank.
2. Input BCA bank code or choose BCA as a transfer destination.
3. Input the Virtual Account number above as the destination account.
4. If the name of the account owner is asked as an additional information on the destination account, fill in the name listed in the Account Name section above.
5. Input the amount of Rupiah you want to deposit.
6. Follow further instruction.
